# Mono

> Mono is a desktop app for Windows and macOS that records audio from any application (Zoom, Teams, Meet, Discord, WhatsApp) without joining calls as a bot. It transcribes, identifies speakers, and lets you search recordings using local AI. One-time $50 payment, no subscription.

## Key Facts
- Price: $50 one-time payment (no subscription)
- Platforms: Windows 10/11, macOS (Apple Silicon + Intel)
- Local AI: transcription, speaker ID, semantic search â€” all on-device
- No cloud uploads required
- Works with: Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, Discord, WhatsApp, Telegram, any audio source
- Alternative to: Otter.ai, Fireflies.ai, Fathom, Krisp, Tactiq
